metas.meta: Differential emission measure of a GOES M2 class flare
K.P.Dere and G. Del Zanna, produced as part of the Arcetri/Cambridge/NRL 'CHIANTI' atomic data base collaboration (Aug 2002)
composite of August 9 1553 and 1554 UT data, modified at high temperature (7.3 to 8.0) by G.Del Zanna to include the emissivities of the hottest ions.
